(99204) OFFICE VISIT, NEW - LEVEL 4 Corynne Boyer DO 110b Springhall Drive Smallville SC 29445 US Localized edema Acute deep vein thrombosis (DVT) of calf muscle vein of right lower extremity Alcoholic hepatitis with ascites Elevated INR Other dietary vitamin B12 deficiency anemia Balance disorder Body mass index (BMI) 21.0-21.9, adult
Plan of Care
Planned Activity Notes Codes Status Date
Visit Plan: R60.0-782.3 Localized edema medical grade compression applied today and donning device provided. wear compression on all day and off at night. elevate when seated. I82.461-453.42 Acute deep vein thrombosis (DVT) of calf muscle vein of right lower extremity holding DOAC for now. repeat imaging ordered for 1 month. if thrombus progresses or if she has worsening symptoms, will start anticoagulation. hopefully will be able to avoid K70.11-571.1 Alcoholic hepatitis with ascites she has not established with a GI dr but is planning to relocate to TX in about 30 days. she will be closer to her son. will have her establish care there (also needs PCP) R79.1-790.92 Elevated INR 2/2 liver disease. renal function and platelets normal D51.3-281.1 Other dietary vitamin B12 deficiency anemia Hb 8.8 during hospitalization R26.89-781.99 Balance disorder declines HH PT today Z68.21-V85.1 Body mass index (BMI) 21.0-21.9, adult
 07/30/2023

I82.461-453.42 Acute deep vein thrombosis (DVT) of calf muscle vein of right lower extremity holding DOAC for now. repeat imaging ordered for 1 month. if thrombus progresses or if she has worsening symptoms, will start anticoagulation. hopefully will be able to avoid K70.11-571.1 Alcoholic hepatitis with ascites she has not established with a GI dr but is planning to relocate to TX in about 30 days. she will be closer to her son. will have her establish care there (also needs PCP) R79.1-790.92 Elevated INR 2/2 liver disease. renal function and platelets normal D51.3-281.1 Other dietary vitamin B12 deficiency anemia Hb 8.8 during hospitalization R26.89-781.99 Balance disorder declines HH PT today Z68.21-V85.1 Body mass index (BMI) 21.0-21.9, adult

medical grade compression applied today and donning device provided. wear compression on all day and off at night. elevate when seated.
